name: Margherita
description: Sometimes you just can’t beat fresh, simple, and classic Margherita Pizza. This most iconic of pizzas is topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves, the colors of the Italian flag.

name: Quattro Formaggio
description: This is the classic version of one of the most wonderful combinations of bread and cheese imaginable. If you like cheese, you'll absolutely love this four-cheese pizza dish! The combination of Ricotta, Mozzarella, Gorgonzola, and Parmesan

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: This crowd-pleasing recipe starts with my fluffy homemade pizza crust and is finished with a sprinkle of crisp bacon. Enjoy the unique flavor combination of bacon and pineapple. It’s love at first bite.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: This crowd-pleasing recipe starts with my fluffy homemade pizza crust and is finished with a sprinkle of crisp bacon. Enjoy the unique flavor combination of bacon and pineapple. It’s love at first bite.

name: Meat Lover's
description: This hefty, cheesy meal on a crust is packed with three different kinds of meat and simply fantastic flavor. Homemade Italian sausage, apple-smoked bacon, and all-natural uncured pepperoni make this pizza a meat-lover's dream.

name: Meat Lover's
